channel.title: How do I run my server off of vps
channel.description:
i need help i've changed the IP in server.java and stuff and client.java but i still can't connect from my main computer.
does the Ip have to be the VPS IP? or what.

item.title: How do I run my server off of vps
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

VPS’s generally have their own dedicated IP and don’t need to be port forwarded. If you turned the server off, its going to say that the port is closed.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I run my server off of vps

item.title: How do I run my server off of vps
item.dc:creator: @T0rvascape T0rvascape
item.description:
@T0rvascape wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:5, topic:470885”]Try seeing if the port is open while the server is running with this website:
http://www.yougetsignal.com/tools/open-ports/
If it works, something is wrong in the client. If not, its the server. :)[/quote]
I’m looking, I’m using Hybrid PVP v1 source + client.
EDIT:
how do i portforward vps’s ?
Now it’s saying the port isn’t open.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I run my server off of vps

Most vpses have all their ports opened by default, but check if they are open/firewall isnt blocking or something
